project_method.title: Select Project Integration Method
project_method.description:
Choose how to integrate Project:

• **By Project ID (recommended):**
  - Simple, only need one ID
  - Automatically gets all devices in project
  
• **By Device IDs list:**
  - Enter individual Chipset IDs
  - Suitable when selecting specific devices

project_id.title: Enter Project ID
project_id.description:
Enter Project ID from SmartSolar management page

**How to get Project ID:**

Step 1: Login to SmartSolar
  → Visit: https://smartsolar.io.vn

Step 2: Go to Project management page
  → Click "Dự án" menu or visit: https://smartsolar.io.vn/Project

Step 3: Create new Project (if not exists)
  → Click "Thêm mới" button
  → Enter Project name (e.g., "Home")
  → Add devices to Project
  → Save

Step 4: View Project to get ID
  → Click on Project name in list
  → Check URL in browser address bar:
     https://smartsolar.io.vn/Monitor/Project?projectId=1072
  → Take number after "projectId=" → that's Project ID

**Specific examples:**
- URL: smartsolar.io.vn/Monitor/Project?projectId=1072
  → Enter: 1072

- URL: smartsolar.io.vn/Monitor/Project?projectId=2048
  → Enter: 2048

**Note:**
- Project must contain at least 1 device
- Enter only the number, not the full URL

project_devices.title: Project Device Configuration
project_devices.description:
Enter the list of SmartSolar MPPT Mạnh Quân device IDs

**Instructions:**
- Enter Chipset IDs, separated by commas (,)
- No limit on number of devices

**Examples:**
- 1 device: `547611`
- 2 devices: `547611,14756976`
- 3 devices: `547611,14756976,123456`
